screen_desc: The screenshot displays the home screen of a smartphone with a pink gradient background. The status bar at the top shows the date, time, and temperature. A menu from the Chrome browser is visible, offering options to open a new tab or incognito tab. The app icons at the bottom include Google Play, Messages, YouTube, Chrome, and Camera, with a Google search bar at the bottom.
history_actions: click on the Google Chrome app located at the right and lower part of the screen.
